tool_description: The Football Live Scores & Odds API provides real-time information about football matches, including live scores, match status, and betting odds. This API is designed to offer up-to-date data for football enthusiasts, sports analysts, and betting applications.
name: Football Live Scores & Odds
title: Football Live Scores & Odds

api_list.name: Get Football Live Scores
api_list.description: Get football live scores and results

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Today matches is getting default others result keywords (ex : livenow, results, yesterday ,tomorrow)

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: You can fetch with team name (ex: Barcelona)
